label: positive
description: Content expressing happiness, satisfaction, or enthusiasm
keywords: happy excited enthusiastic satisfied pleased joyful optimistic amazing wonderful great excellent fantastic awesome love beautiful brilliant perfect impressed delighted

label: neutral
description: Content that is informational, objective, or balanced
keywords: informational factual objective balanced descriptive neutral standard normal typical average moderate reasonable fair impartial unbiased okay fine

label: negative
description: Content expressing anger, frustration, or disappointment
keywords: angry frustrated disappointed critical upset pessimistic terrible awful bad horrible hate disappointed annoyed irritated furious disgusted worst failure broken

label: mixed
description: Content containing both positive and negative elements
keywords: mixed feelings both positive negative elements pros cons advantages disadvantages tradeoffs bittersweet complicated nuanced conflicted ambivalent
